title: The Universe Spoke To This Bert Show Member When They Needed It The Most
description:
We've all heard the phrase, "The universe works in mysterious ways." For Moe this has been proven true time and time again. 
Just when he needed it most, the universe put someone in his path with the message he needed to hear.
He explains...
